item.title: Chiyaan Vikram, Pa Ranjith's film is titled 'Thangalaan'
item.description: Chiyaan Vikram, Pa Ranjith’s film is titled ‘Thangalaan’ 'Thangalaan' is reportedly set against the backdrop of early 19th-century mining.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16: Karan Johar gets slammed by netizens for being 'biased', want Salman Khan back as host
item.description: Bigg Boss 16: Karan Johar gets slammed by netizens for being ‘biased’, want Salman Khan back as host Bigg Boss 16: As Salman Khan is down with dengue, Karan Johar has taken over the show as Khan's replacement.

item.title: Couple Goals: Vicky Kaushal is 'stunned' with wife Katrina Kaif's Diwali look
item.description: Couple Goals: Vicky Kaushal is ‘stunned’ with wife Katrina Kaif’s Diwali look Katrina took to Instagram to share a photo of her Diwali look and amongst the many compliments she received from her friends and fans in the comment section, the most special one came from her husband Vicky Kaushal.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan hides from paparazzi as he attends Diwali party with son Aryan Khan, Janhvi Kapoor arrives with ex-beau Shikhar Pahariya
item.description: Shah Rukh Khan hides from paparazzi as he attends Diwali party with son Aryan Khan, Janhvi Kapoor arrives with ex-beau Shikhar Pahariya Actor Shah Rukh Khan and his son Aryan Khan attended the Diwali party of producer-writer Amrit Pal Bindra on Sunday evening.

item.title: Sunrise by window, Sunday brunch with her gang, here's how Malaika Arora celebrated 48th birthday
item.description: Sunrise by window, Sunday brunch with her gang, here’s how Malaika Arora celebrated 48th birthday ANI Mumbai, October 24 Actor Malaika Arora turned 49 on Sunday.

item.title: Ayushmann Khurrana pens a heartfelt note on Team India’s victory, says, ‘This story is for my future generations’
item.description: Ayushmann Khurrana pens a heartfelt note on Team India’s victory, says, ‘This story is for my future generations’ Ayushmann Khurrana penned a heartfelt note on Twitter sharing his experience of watching the nail-biting thriller while onboard a flight to his hometown.

item.title: Yashoda poster: Samantha Ruth Prabhu blushes as friends teaser her, see photo
item.description: Yashoda poster: Samantha Ruth Prabhu blushes as friends teaser her, see photo Production house Sridevi Movies on Monday shared a new poster for the upcoming film Yashoda , which features Samantha Ruth Prabhu in the lead role.

item.title: Black Adam Box Office: Dwayne Johnson starrer earns this much in India in 1st weekend
